english: The plaintiff sees no chance of success .
chinese: 原告认为没有胜诉的机会。

english: The prosecutor accused the defendant of fraud .
chinese: 原告控告被告犯有欺诈罪。

english: Judgment was given against the plaintiff .
The pursuer requests the court to grant him remedy .
chinese: 原告要求法院给予救济。

english: The plaintiff had won, but was ruined financially .
chinese: 原告虽然胜诉，如弄得倾家荡产。
原告造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The prosecution makes certain changes against the defence .
chinese: 原告对被告提出若干指控。

english: It follows that the title to the lands in question is in the plaintiff .
chinese: 由此可见，双方争执之土地所有权应属于原告一方。

english: The prosecution has shouted, stormed, and threatened, but he has not said why bigger thomas killed !
chinese: 原告大声嚷嚷着，暴跳如雷，进行恫吓，但他没说出来比格托马斯为什么杀人！

english: An annotation of plaintiff in lawsuits of public interests
chinese: 对公益诉讼原告的诠释

english: Copy of this letter is sent to the complainant
chinese: 这个邮件的复印件已经发给了原告。

english: The judge decided the case in favor of the plaintiff
chinese: 那法官的判决有利于原告。

english: It is in this way that the applicant company acted
chinese: 这正是原告公司的行事方法。

english: Study on the burden of proof in administrative action
chinese: 行政诉讼原告资格比较研究

english: Load of proof of plaintiff in administrative action
chinese: 论我国行政公益诉讼原告资格
